teamDescriptions.Alex: Team leader. Things he was responsible for: organizing teamwork, building the basic structure of the application, private and public routes, the main page, drag and drop on the board page and the sticky header with user menu. Things he likes: coding, football and beer. Things he dislikes: factory.
teamDescriptions.Artyom: The guy responsible for all interactions with backend. Deployed server and wrote all API requests. Created login, sign up and edit profile page, set up app localization. Things he likes: beer and clean code. Things he dislikes: work.
teamDescriptions.Roma: The guy responsible for the welcome page, error pages, application error handling, whiteboard page and interaction with columns and tasks. Thing he likes: cooking, bicycles and computers.  Things he dislikes: beer ;)
